text: The Northern Ireland Fire and Rescue Service (NIFRS) is the fire service for Northern Ireland, United Kingdom. 2000 people work for the NIFRS. There are 67 fire stations in Northern Ireland. Sometimes bad people throw stones at the firemen.Firefighters targeted in attacks Some firemen were killed in the Troubles. == References == Category:Organisations based in Northern Ireland
title: Northern Ireland Fire and Rescue Service
